§ Kemeta

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

In the [[world-18]] //animation// and //fictional world//, the **kemeta** is one of the [[world-18-locations]].

**kemeta** is a planet.

Planet **kemeta** is home to a number of different sapient species — humans being just one of them.

Although small, [[seyawt]] is a village on planet **kemeta** of importance.
